item.title: Working with Date and Time
item.description: In R, the package lubridate handles date and times. Basic Functions Current Date/Time Current time: SELECT NOW(); Table 1: 1 records now 2020-03-23 00:13:29 Current date: today() ## [1] "2020-03-23" as_date(now()) ## [1] "2020-03-23" SELECT current_time; Table 2: 1 records current_time 00:13:29.623558 SELECT NOW()::DATE; Table 3: 1 records now 2020-03-23 Addition and Subtraction In R, durations are always stored in seconds.
